name: Baked Chicken Florida
instructions: In small bowl combine SOUP, JUICE, SEASONING and tarragon. Place chicken in shallow baking dish and pour mixture on top. Cover; refrigerate at least 2 hours, turning chicken occasionally.
Heat oven to 375 degrees. Arrange chicken in shallow roasting pan and bake 50 minutes or until fork-tender, basting frequently with marinade. Remove to serving platter and keep warm.

Pour remaining marinade and pan drippings into 1-qt. saucepan; stir in cornstarch. Heat to boiling, stirring occasionally; cook 1 minute more. Spoon some sauce over chicken use remainder as sauce for rice.
